Configuration.Name: Open URL Libkey Chrome
Configuration.Author: IDS Project
Configuration.Description: Does a full open URL query for a given ILLiad Request. Can be used with the SFX Link Resolver. Should work with any OpenURL resolver.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Defines whether the search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: OpenUrlBaseArticle
Setting.Description: The base article URL for the openURL resolver to use. For SFX users this is the same URL for articles and books.

Setting.name: OpenUrlBaseBook
Setting.Description: The base book URL for the openURL resolver to use. For SFX users this is the same URL for articles and books.

Setting.name: OpenUrlBrand
Setting.Description: The local branding to be displayed on the tab within ILLiad.
